title: Live Kernel Patching
description: An analyst must apply a critical vulnerability patch to the Linux kernel on hundreds of production servers without rebooting them.

tasks.description: Identify all servers that require the live kernel patch.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst has a complete list of target servers.

tasks.description: Use a live patching tool (e.g., kpatch, KernelCare) to deploy the patch to all affected servers in memory.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst successfully deploys the patch without requiring a system reboot.

tasks.description: Verify that the patch is active on all servers and that they are no longer vulnerable.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst confirms the live patch has successfully remediated the vulnerability across the fleet.
